remarks: Distributive/associative law for inner product, useful for linearity proofs.  (Contributed by NM, 10-May-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: hiassdi $p |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. ~H ) /\ ( C e. ~H /\ D e. ~H ) ) -> ( ( ( A .h B ) +h C ) .ih D ) = ( ( A x. ( B .ih D ) ) + ( C .ih D ) ) ) $.
